data.text: @ThanosPoulos We're glad to read that your incident was solved. Apologies for all the inconveniences, from this channel we remain at your disposal for any other inquiry. Kind regards.

@LuisStein Hola Luis, sentimos las molestias que el incidente esté causando. Si ya han pasado 21 días desde que iniciaste la reclamación, por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con tu código PIR y nombre completo para verificar e indicarte cómo proceder. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@Ing_Leninhedz Hola, ¿nos confirmas si realizaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto tras el incidente?. Si es así, por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con tu nombre completo y código PIR para revisar. Saludos. 
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@RuthJackson7 Hola Ruth, were you able to report this incident directly at the airport? If you have your PIR code, you will be able to track your bag here in our website https://t.co/uE1w4kTKL4 . Kind regards.

@_paulasalcedo_ Hola Paula, sentimos leer tus comentarios. Por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con el código PIR asociado a la reclamación por la demora del equipaje y tu nombre completo para revisar e indicarte como proceder. Saludos.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Chiwilla Hola Shelley, lamentamos mucho leer lo que nos indicas. En este caso, si el proceso de entrega ya ha comenzado te pedimos por favor comunicarte directamente con el transportista para que puedan verificar los detalles de la entrega. Saludos.

@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, unfortunately we haven't received news of your case from the corresponding department. We revised your PIR too and we see that it is working properly, we suggest you to use a computer while revising it from our website https://t.co/uE1w4kTKL4 . Kind regards.
@alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, we will contact you as soon as we have any update. Regards.
@DanielFDeRosa We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@parasjethwasurg Hola, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you.
@saulniermike Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@tvrtastic Hola Robert, we replied you your DM. Regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@William69471087 Hello William.  You can fill a claim  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG our Customer Service Team will review what happened and they will contact you directly with a resolution. 
Kind Regards,

domain.name: Multimedia Franchise

data.text:
@ThanosPoulos Hola Thanos. We have answered your direct message. 
Kind regards,

@hjroy Hola Heather. If the purchase was made through an Agency,  you should consult with who managed, charged and issued your boooking. Your Agency should have the tools to contact between entities. 
Kind regards,

@NotoriousVkb We have reviewed your case, however we see no news about the lost object. We could not indicate anything new or additional, we are attentive to any update in case there is a coincidence on the part of the corresponding area, regards.
@NotoriousVkb Hola, without the details of your query we would not know how to assist you, we remain attentive to the data of your case by private means to give you a better answer. Regards.

@Janironi Hello Janironi, if you are at the airport it is important that you carry out the corresponding claim there. Can you confirm if you have been able to do it? We are attentive to your comments, regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@NotoriousVkb Hola, we are sorry that you have this impression about us, we do not know the details of your case through this channel. If you wish you can leave us a description of your query by DM, we are attentive to your messages. Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@CCarson09784955 https://t.co/ci7QjJOm3t there you can indicate the data of your suitcase and request the PIR number indicated. We are at your disposal and attentive to news, regards./2

@CCarson09784955 Hola, we do not know the details of your case through this channel. We understand that if you have not managed to open a claim on your luggage at the airport it is important that you contact our colleagues at the luggage center according to your country from the following link:/1
@ayaminishimura Hola Ayami, we are sorry that it has been that way, if you have managed to solve this inconvenience with our colleagues we will remain at your disposal for any new queries, regards.

@SayItAintTom Hola, it would be helpful if you told us the details of your case by DM, let us know in the same way if you have managed to open a claim at the airport about your luggage, we wait for your response. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Adrin67009997 Hola Adrián, desconocemos los detalles de lo sucedido. Por favor envíanos un mensaje directo con más información para que podamos dar seguimiento a tu caso desde este medio. Quedamos atentos a tu mensaje. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@phylleib Phylis, in this case if you want you can contact our colleagues selecting the number that corresponds tu your country  https://t.co/14lDG0l3kq or you can send a DM here https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@phylleib Hola Phyllis, we are going to help you, please send us your booking code and ticket number (075*****) so we can verify. we remain at your disposal, regards.

@NaeemChoudry7 Hola Naeem, did you open a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR number? Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the information, so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@AcbroAirlines Hola Ryan, we are sorry to hear this. Did you open a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR number? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the corresponding information. We remain at your disposal, regards.

data.text: @ThanosPoulos Hola Thanos, we are going to help you form this channel. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with your booking code and ticket number (075******) so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards

@ayaminishimura Hola Ayami, sorry for the inconvenience. If both flights are under the same booking and you bought the ticket from us, please contact our colleagues at the airport and ask for a flight relocation. Kind regards

data.text: @FowlerCarmona Since the ticket was purchased through BA, in case you want to complaint, please contact British Airways, as they are responsible for the ticket issuance and to inform which airline operates the flight that you booked. Sorry for the inconvenience

data.text: @scheikh Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please delete the claim reference number from your public tweet and send us a DM with such info? Then we'll be able to contact the claims department and check the status of your case https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

data.text: @scheikh Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please delete the claim reference number from your public tweet and send us a DM with such info? Then we'll be able to contact the claims department and check the status of your case https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Yeliz30170546 @Iberia_de Hola Yel, sorry for the misunderstanding. As explained before, this was a typo. Instead of writing 180 GBP, our colleagues wrote 280 GBP. On your email to them, you said that you paid 100 GBP for one bag and 80 GBP for the other. That's why the correct refund amount is 180 GBP

@AntoFuentes Hola Antonia. ¿Podrías indicarnos si tienes alguna consulta o proceso en el que te podamos asistir por este medio? Si es así, envíanos un DM, para poder revisar.
Quedamos a disposición. Un saludo.
@DanielFDeRosa Hola Daniel, we're sorry to read this. Your comments will be taken in consideration for us to improve the quality of our airport services. Apologies for the inconvenience

@HomeDayton Hola Dayton, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your bag claim , PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@bmacw8 Hola bee, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@ritvikagg_ Hola Ritvik, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM all booking detailss, code, ticket number, registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advnace https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Chiwilla Hola Shelley, we have replied your DM. Regards

@StarlightXKape Hola Jennie, unless it is an error, from social networks we do not have details of your query. Please send us a DM with the information so we can follow up from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@DavidPFrance Hola David, please send us more details about your case via DM so we can verify all the information. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa. Kind regards.
@dePlantagenet Hola Daniel, please send us more details of your inquiry and your flight so that we can check more information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Plan your journey and book your ticket anywhere, anytime at Iberia website - Iberia

data.text: @mmsforbreakfast We suggest you select the 'My dates are flexible' option on our flight search website (https://t.co/TcJeGFzOX2) to have more possibilities of finding the desired flight. Kind regards. /2
@mmsforbreakfast Hola Rachel, we confirm that we have the direct flight IB 6131 on the route that you tell us. In this case, the information may vary depending on the date of your flight. /1

@amahou5 Hola Ama, salvo que se trate de un error no tenemos mensajes previos tuyos. Para poder ayudarte desde este canal, envíanos un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) con toda la información correspondiente. Quedamos a tu disposición, saludos.
@Natirrocks por lo que para poder verificar sobre lo sucedido deberá contactar la persona titular de la reserva. Saludos. /2

@Natirrocks Hola Nati, desconocemos los detalles de lo sucedido; sin embargo, te confirmamos que los requisitos correspondientes a COVID son establecidos por las autoridades de cada país y nosotros como aerolínea cumplimos lo que ellos establecen, /1
@razzscripts Hola Adrià, please send us a direct message with more details so we can follow up from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@jquirozca Hola, lamentamos escuchar lo que nos comentas. Desconocemos los detalles de la gestión que deseas realizar, para poder ayudarte desde este canal, envíanos un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) con toda la información que consideres relevante. Quedamos a tu disposición, saludos.

urls.title: Foundspot - Worldwide service to retrieve your lost property
urls.description: Foundspot es un servicio gratuito que conecta automáticamente a personas que han perdido cualquier objeto con quien lo ha encontrado.

data.text: @alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, unfortunately not yet, there isn't any update, you can verify it through the following link https://t.co/cqcC1jUho6. When there's a match, you will receive an email with further details. Regards.
@Bor_Zanon Hola, we are sorry for the delay in our response, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@jaywithap Hola Juan, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@TaraCivicHealth Hola Tara, sorry for the delay. We've replied your DMs
@jaywithap Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@stewiestern Hola Stewie, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...), along with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MsBennyBonsu We've sent you a new DM explaining how to follow up the searches through the World Tracer website. We first directed you to BA, because your PIR belongs to them
@MsBennyBonsu We've replied your new DMs

data.text: @shoppingelectra Hola. Sentimos leer lo que nos has comentado. Si el vuelo ha sido operado por Vueling, ellos serían los encargados de proporcionarte mayor asistencia al respecto. Saludos.
@MsBennyBonsu You're welcome :)
@MsBennyBonsu Hola Benny, sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your DMs
@NadiaAltizio your booking code, full name, ticket number and the seat purchase references (07555...) https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@NadiaAltizio Hola Nadia, sorry to read this. Since the mask is still mandatory for flights in Spain, we ask our passengers to wear it. Unfortunately, we don't have any info about when the mask won't be mandatory in means of transport in Spain. Regarding the seats, please send us a DM with/1
@jaeyunlight Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@TheRealSchacter Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs. Please check
@Svetosl02460691 Sorry for the delay, Svetoslav. We've just replied it

@easyos2000 We're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our apologies once again. Your comments will be taken in consideration for us to improve the quality of our ground service. Kind regards
@amaaaliss Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and remain at your disposal. Best regards

@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, we are sorry to read this, we have already replied your previous message, as soon as our colleagues have any update, they will contact you directly by sms or email. Kind regards
@ScandiMumOfFour Hola Kir, we have replied your DM. Regards
@cheunghk5 Hola Cheung, we have sent you more information through our direct message conversation. Regards.
@mlbastidas Hello, we have sent a reply to your direct message. Kind regards.
@trace_geog Hola, we're sorry to read what you tell us. Please send us more details through a DM so we can verify more information from here. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MichaelaPetty9 Hola Michaela, thank you for confirming that you have received your luggage. We remain at your disposal for any future consultation. Kind regards.

@vidominguez_ Hola Vicky, en principio el equipaje de cabina siempre estaría incluido, podrás confirmar los detalles de tu reserva ingresando con el código y apellido aquí: https://t.co/EobUyfVeT9
 Saludos

@vidominguez_ Hola Vicky, ¿en qué podemos orientarte? en principio si tu consulta es sobre compra de equipaje adicional, el importe entendemos será en la moneda del país emisor de la reserva ¿nos confirmas si has logrado hacer la compra? Saludos

@LouHugh94144201 We're really sorry, Lou. Unfortunately, we're still waiting for an update from the relevant department. Please wait for the bags confirmation of arrival via SMS or email. Kind regards
@LesisMore1313 Hola Leslie, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@carsonwaldrop Hola Carson, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@felgheriani Hola, we've just replied your DMs. Sorry for the delay
@trulo910 Hola Mary, could you give us the details of the error by DM? Thank you.

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, unfortunately, there isn't any update on the foundspot website, as you can see at https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx . If there's a match, you will receive an email with further details. Kind regards
@EmelVaz Hola Emel, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@yolandah_b We will check this internally and contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@Chiwilla Hola Shelley, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs. Please check
@zebraleopard Hola, sorry to read this. Unfortunately, if we issued your ticket and you missed the connection, only our colleagues at the airport will be able to assist you. Kind regards

@trulo910 Sorry for the inconvenience. The upgrade must be requested during the check-in at the airport or on the online check-in when there's an upgrade offer. The agents at the boarding gate aren't able to process it, unfortunately. Kind regards
@LouieLazenby Hola Louie, we sent you a message. Regards.
@easyos2000 Hola Joseph, we apologize for the situation, please send us as much details as you can by DM. Regards.
@cheunghk5 Hello, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@AymenBrasco Hello Aymen, have you made a polie report and a report with our team at the airport? Let us know the details by DM. Thank you.
@merceds_vidal Hola Mercedes, si lo deseas facilítanos por DM el número de expediente de reclamación para poder revisar. Saludos
@jennylmooney Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, Our colleagues will contact you as soon as they have any update, we appreciate your patience, Regards.
@BriDeehan Hola Siobhan, could you send us the PIR or report number and your complete name by DM? Thank you.
@Quynh_CA8 We understand that the personal accessory must be under your seat, so you will be able to adjust it to the space with the difference. Regards :)
@CrucianGal23 Hola Gen, thank you for your comments, we are glad your bag was located and solved the situation with our agents help. We remain at your disposal. Kind regards
@Claudia51395756 Hola Claudia, ¿nos das más información en un MD?. Así podremos asistirte en lo que necesites. Saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@merceds_vidal Hola Mercedes, por esta red social no hemos recibido detalles anteriores de tu caso, para poder asistirte por este medio envíanos los detalles de tu reclamación web en un md, saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@kioreanu Hola Melinda, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM. Regards
